name: Secret Adventures
description:
SECRET ADVENTURES

What is this game ? This games is  "4 Shorts Concept ".

* Short Game* - You can enjoy the game within 1 hour (or more).
* Short Story* - You can easy understand for story of the games.
* Short Puzzle* - You can solve mini puzzle to find way out from the maze.
* Short Quest* - You can get some quest for collect items for unlock exit from the maze.

- Story -

David is the kid of high school,He enjoy with friends in the club,And then he and his friends was disappeared! He must find the way out go back to present world.
